review: Misleading information: it does not connect to wifi. I thought it could be a weird problem with my wireless network (since all my other devices work fine), but I found out thousand of people have the same problem. It is impossible to use, it does not establish a working connection. Also, it does not screen mirror Apple devices and it does not work with some apps, like popcorn time. I just spent my money with something useless.
